title: AI-Based Mathematics Education Design and Management Strategies in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge and general understanding of AI applications
context.additional_context: Design and evaluation strategies for AI-driven personalized mathematics education targeting professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design of three or more mathematical concept simulations using AI-based tools
Learners can present two or more case studies of AI analysis applications in VR educational environments
Learners can submit improvement plans for instructional design based on formative assessment data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
